about_the_game:
Embark on Julia’s journey in this 2.5D eco-apocalyptic adventure where survival is more than just a struggle—it’s a discovery. Based on Alejandra Bruno’s award-winning novel La Hija del Delta, The Swamp Daughter offers a rich narrative of identity, choices, and environmental collapse.

As you guide Julia through a decaying, mysterious swamp, you’ll unravel her hidden past while shaping her future. Every decision ripples through the game’s branching story, leading to multiple endings that reflect your choices.

The dangerous, dreamlike landscape of the swamp is more than just a backdrop—it’s a living character in itself. Explore, gather vital resources, and piece together the mystery of Julia’s origins. With a blend of quick-time events, puzzles, and exploration, The Swamp Daughter immerses players in a world where every choice matters, and every step deepens the emotional, gripping tale of survival.

Key Features:

  • Branching Narrative: Make crucial decisions that shape the story and lead to multiple unique endings.

  • A Beautiful but Dangerous World: Explore a stunning yet decaying swamp filled with both beauty and peril.

  • Engaging Survival Mechanics: Face quick-time events, resource management, and puzzles that test your skills.

  • Environmental Storytelling: Discover the ruins of civilization and uncover clues to Julia’s identity.

  • Unique Farming and Construction Mini-Games: Develop skills to survive while respecting the fragile ecosystem.

Dynamic Cinematics: Experience cinematic storytelling with stunning art and camera mapping that bring the world to life.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ compatible video card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card

  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ compatible video card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card

short_description: Embark on Julia’s journey in this 2.5D eco-apocalyptic adventure of choices, exploration, and puzzles. Explore a dangerous swamp and face tough choices while you uncover her past in this intriguing tale of identity and survival.
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
